ninjas.title: Ninjas Don’t Hide — They Just Move Faster
ninjas.text: Ninjas aren’t hiding, they’re already gone before you blink. Speed is their secret, and you’ll never catch them in action. Things disappear? Probably a ninja at work. Being fast isn’t a talent—it’s a lifestyle.

ninjas.title: Silent but Awesome
ninjas.text: It’s quiet… too quiet. That usually means a ninja is nearby. They never make noise, yet amazing stuff happens around them. When things magically get fixed, a ninja probably did it.

ninjas.title: Certified Shadow
ninjas.text: Shadows are a ninja’s playground. They’ve spent so long in the dark, they might as well live there. When everything else fails, trust the shadows. Mastering the art of hiding in plain sight is harder than it looks.

ninjas.title: Ninjas: Masters of Showing Up
ninjas.text: You never see them coming. Ninjas appear when you least expect it—usually at the worst possible moment. Surprise is their favorite tactic, scaring everyone included. If you feel watched… congratulations, you’re probably right.

ninjas.title: Stealth Mode: On
ninjas.text: Stealth isn’t a switch; it’s a ninja default. They’re so quiet, even silence gets jealous. If you think you saw one, you didn’t. But don’t worry… they’ve definitely seen you.
